BASIC_INFO.AUTHOR: Sean Oldenburger
BASIC_INFO.PROJECT DESCRIPTION: Automating workflows to reduce manual tasks and improve efficiency at a finance firm.

PLAN:
Website Interface:
- Develop a user-friendly interface for automating workflows.
- Include a drag-and-drop feature for uploading documents.
- Provide a visual preview of uploaded documents.
- Implement a page selection UI for users to choose which pages to extract information from.
- Display a preview of extracted information in a structured format.
- Enable export of extracted data to Word with styling options.
- Ensure secure login with username and password protection.

Automation Logic:
- Conduct an initial discovery session to identify all automations needed.
- Create a comprehensive list of automations to implement based on the discovery findings.
- Develop feasibility assessments for each automation identified.
- Design a high-level structure for each automation, detailing data requirements, touchpoints, and applications involved.
- Implement automation solutions using Microsoft Power Automate as the preferred tool.
- Ensure all automations comply with security requirements, especially regarding client data.

Integration:
- Integrate the automation system with existing CRM and invoicing systems.
- Ensure seamless data flow between the automation tools and current workflows.
- Provide access to necessary applications and data for successful automation implementation.

Testing and Iteration:
- Conduct thorough testing of each automation to ensure functionality and efficiency.
- Gather feedback from Kelly King and her team during the testing phase.
- Iterate on the automation solutions based on feedback to improve performance and user experience.

Training and Support:
- Provide training sessions for Kelly King and her team on how to use the new automation tools.
- Offer ongoing support during the initial rollout phase to address any issues or questions.
- Develop documentation outlining the processes and functionalities of the automation system for future reference.
SCOPE:
This project aims to automate workflows at Iconic Wealth, focusing on reducing manual tasks and improving efficiency within the finance firm. The automation will be developed using Microsoft Power Automate, leveraging AI to streamline processes and enhance productivity. The initial phase will involve a discovery session to identify all necessary automations, followed by the implementation of tailored solutions based on the findings.

AI Advancements will play a crucial role in this project by conducting the discovery session, developing the automation solutions, and ensuring that all systems comply with security requirements. The team will provide training and ongoing support to Kelly King and her staff, ensuring a smooth transition to the new automated workflows.
KEY_DELIVERABLES: Conduct an initial discovery session to identify all necessary automations.
Develop a comprehensive list of automations to implement based on discovery findings.
Create feasibility assessments for each identified automation.
Design a high-level structure for each automation detailing data requirements and touchpoints.
Provide training sessions for Kelly King and her team on using the new automation tools.
ASSUMPTIONS: Client will provide access to existing CRM and invoicing systems for integration.
Client will be available for scheduled meetings during the discovery and implementation phases.
Client will supply necessary data and information required for the automation solutions.
Client will ensure all security requirements are met for handling client data.
Client will apply for the small business growth grant to support the project budget.
